PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2008-18312008-12-03HERITAGE,  ,  ,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Board of Trustees of the National Museum of Science and Technology of DENISE AMYOT of Ottawa, Ontario, as Director of the National Museum of Science and Technology, to hold office during pleasure for a term of five years, effective January 5, 2009.
AttachmentsAttachment
